column4: i'm trying to oplay a dvd, but it's not working - which software should i use?
can anyone please just telll me which software to use?
how do i get the right plugins?
it says it cannot play it because it does not have the appropriate plugins to be able to read from the disc
you might want to enable the medibuntu.org repositories to play that dvd instructions can be found at the site
a physical dvd? I believe you need libdvdcss2 from medibuntu.org
try darkentity's way, and if that is not successful then check out medibuntu.org
can you help me get that thing you're talking about?
medibuntu.org is a website--take a look there
yes, but you need to a repository
best to be a bit patient, not much more now
I can get you up and running if you just calm down a bit
where are they generally downloaded? check there
thanks.... i looked in the wrong place
